executiveSummary: Jonathan Boos, founder of W端rkin Stiffs, pitched his magnetic collar stay product 'Power Stays' on Shark Tank seeking $85,000 for 10% equity. After a heated exchange with Daymond John and negotiations among multiple Sharks, Jonathan secured a deal with Barbara Corcoran and Daymond John for $100,000 in exchange for 30% equity.
keyDecisions: Jonathan accepted a joint offer from Barbara Corcoran and Daymond John for $100,000 in exchange for 30% equity in W端rkin Stiffs.

actionItems.task: Finalize investment agreement terms with Barbara Corcoran and Daymond John.
Collaborate with Barbara and Daymond to expand W端rkin Stiffs brand presence and develop new products.

nextSteps: Jonathan will work with Barbara and Daymond to formalize their investment deal and leverage their expertise to scale the W端rkin Stiffs brand and launch additional products.
